ratings.comment: Minjing was very organized, her slides are very complete so you don't have to read the book. The homework was easy. She was very clear of what she wanted us to know for the exams so preparing for it is not a problem. Attend lecture since she goes over the problem is er slides step by step. This is not a hard class, and 35% get an A.

Minjing Tao was not the greatest but not the worst. She was very dry during the lectures unless you asked a question. The exams were tricky, but she allowed crib sheets, and for the final it was notes or open book. The homework was 40% which was crazy. She did a bad job of explaining matlab in class. If you get her, read your book you'll learn more
